A private home care agency catering for individuals aged 18 years and over with differing needs including learning disabilities, alzheimers, dementia or anyone who may need support, eg for shopping, light housekeeping or companionship. Offers 2 hour minimum call duration up to 24 hours a day 7 days a week. This company is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC), to make sure they provide a quality service.
This organisation also provides advice and support to people who receive direct payments. Helps individuals to manage their care budget.
